Text: Thank you for this dickspic I have a friend who used to live in Darby and am sure he will enjoy this. Bet it will bring back some memories for him.

Thanks Dickspic....I know David Gibb and Elly Lucas well from the Derbyshire Music scene, thanks for sharing this little gem. You haven't byu any chance come across John Tam's Home Service album re-issue? I saw them recently at Cambridge and they did a storming set.
